mapper.sql: DELIVERY_ORDER_ID as deliveryOrderId, COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID as commodityContractId, USER_ID as userId, USER_TRADE_ACCOUNT_ID as userTradeAccountId, COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE as commodityUnitPrice, APPLY_COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY as applyCommodityUnitQuantity, APPLY_COMMODITY_STANDARD_UNIT_QUANTITY as applyCommodityStandardUnitQuantity, COUPON_UNIT_QUANTITY as couponUnitQuantity, ADD_ON_COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY as addOnCommodityUnitQuantity, ACT_CONSUME_COMM_UNIT_QUANTITY as actConsumeCommUnitQuantity, FEE_PERCENT as feePercent, ADD_ON_PRICE as addOnPrice, FEE_PRICE as feePrice, POSTAGE_PRICE as postagePrice, COUPON_INFO as couponInfo, COUPON_PRICE as couponPrice, ACTUAL_PRICE as actualPrice, INCOME_PAY_INFO as incomePayInfo, ADDRESSEE_NAME as addresseeName, ADDRESSEE_MOBILE_PHONE as addresseeMobilePhone, STORAGEOUT_MODE as storageoutMode, PROVICE_FIRST_STAGE_NAME as proviceFirstStageName, ADDRESS_CITY_SECOND_STAGE_NAME as addressCitySecondStageName, ADDRESS_COUNTIES_THIRD_STAGE_NAME as addressCountiesThirdStageName, ADDRESS_DETAIL_INFO as addressDetailInfo, ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE as addressPostalCode, DATE_EXPECT as dateExpect, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS as commodityFlowRecordIds, LOGISTICS_OPERATOR as logisticsOperator, LOGISTICS_ORDER_ID as logisticsOrderId, EXPRESS_INFO_ID as expressInfoId, STATUS as status, ORDER_TIME as orderTime, APPLY_CANCEL_TIME as applyCancelTime, DELIVERY_TIME as deliveryTime, SUCCESS_TIME as successTime, CLOSE_TIME as closeTime, EXPIRE_TIME as expireTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from delivery_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into delivery_order (COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID, USER_ID, USER_TRADE_ACCOUNT_ID, COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE, APPLY_COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY, APPLY_COMMODITY_STANDARD_UNIT_QUANTITY, COUPON_UNIT_QUANTITY, ADD_ON_COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY, ACT_CONSUME_COMM_UNIT_QUANTITY, FEE_PERCENT, ADD_ON_PRICE, FEE_PRICE, POSTAGE_PRICE, COUPON_INFO, COUPON_PRICE, ACTUAL_PRICE, INCOME_PAY_INFO, ADDRESSEE_NAME, ADDRESSEE_MOBILE_PHONE, STORAGEOUT_MODE, PROVICE_FIRST_STAGE_NAME, ADDRESS_CITY_SECOND_STAGE_NAME, ADDRESS_COUNTIES_THIRD_STAGE_NAME, ADDRESS_DETAIL_INFO, ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE, DATE_EXPECT, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS, LOGISTICS_OPERATOR, LOGISTICS_ORDER_ID, EXPRESS_INFO_ID, STATUS, ORDER_TIME, APPLY_CANCEL_TIME, DELIVERY_TIME, SUCCESS_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME ) values (#{commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userTradeAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyCommodityUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, update delivery_order
DELIVERY_ORDER_ID = #{record.deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{record.commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_TRADE_ACCOUNT_ID = #{record.userTradeAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE = #{record.commodityUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},

FEE_PRICE = #{record.feePrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},

INCOME_PAY_INFO = #{record.incomePayInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESSEE_NAME = #{record.addresseeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESSEE_MOBILE_PHONE = #{record.addresseeMobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORAGEOUT_MODE = #{record.storageoutMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ADDRESS_CITY_SECOND_STAGE_NAME = #{record.addressCitySecondStageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ADDRESS_DETAIL_INFO = #{record.addressDetailInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE = #{record.addressPostalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE_EXPECT = #{record.dateExpect,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{record.commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGISTICS_OPERATOR = #{record.logisticsOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGISTICS_ORDER_ID = #{record.logisticsOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRESS_INFO_ID = #{record.expressInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

APPLY_CANCEL_TIME = #{record.applyCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELIVERY_TIME = #{record.deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUCCESS_TIME = #{record.successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_TIME = #{record.closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{record.expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
